description: The rule and options related to fsGroup to use in security context.

ranges.description: The allowed ranges of fsGroups. If you would like to force a single fsGroup then supply a single range with the same `start` and `end`. This is required when `rule` is set to `"MustRunAs"`. Each item in the list must be a supported fsGroup ID or `"*"`.

rule.description: The strategy that will dictate what fsGroup is used in the SecurityContext.
